This website hosts the comic book **Lumi's Delight** and its various translations. The book is intended for young readers aged 6-10 years old but older readers hopefully enjoy the content, too!

**Written and illustrated** by [Coline Weinz](https://colineweinzaepflen.com/).

**Edited** by [Dr Anna M Biller](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=zudbegkAAAAJ&hl=de), Dr. Alejandra Parreño, Dr. Simone Stegbauer, Dr. Verena Streibel, and Dr. Matthew The.
